title: Fresher Student Hiring-Review AI Output - Remote
description:
* Role Overview


 Sourcing talented students in India to support a leading AI lab‚Äôs evaluation and research workflows. Freelancers will assess outputs from large language models (LLMs) and contribute to improving system quality. This is an ideal opportunity for students to gain hands\\-on experience with AI tools in a flexible, part\\-time capacity. The engagement is expected to be short\\-term with potential for extension based on project needs. Skills: application,computer,student,fresher
   

  

* Key Responsibilities
* Evaluate AI\\-generated outputs for accuracy, clarity, and relevance.
* Use prompts and feedback loops to assess model behavior.
* Complete structured review tasks and provide quality assessments.
* Follow detailed guidelines and collaborate asynchronously with project leads.
* Ideal Qualifications
* Current student (undergraduate or Master‚Äôs) at an accredited Indian university.
* Strong written and verbal communication skills in English.
* Demonstrated experience using AI tools or large language models (e.g., ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini).
* Comfort working independently and managing flexible tasks with minimal supervision.
* More About the Opportunity
* Remote and asynchronous ‚Äî freelancers set their own hours.
* Estimated 5‚Äì10 hours of work per week.
* Project\\-based contract with ongoing task availability depending on performance.
* Compensation \\& Contract Terms
* ‚Çπ14‚Äì‚Çπ20/hour for freelancers based in India (converted from USD range).
* Classified as an independent contractor.
* Payments processed weekly via Stripe Connect for completed work.
* Application Process
* Submit your resume and a brief overview of your experience with AI tools.
* Candidates may be asked to complete a short evaluation task.
* Expect to hear back within 5‚Äì7 business days.

title: Staff Engineer
description:
**This role is for one of the Weekday's clients**
**Salary range: Rs 3000000 \\- Rs 9000000 (ie INR 30\\-90 LPA)**
 Min Experience: 10 years
   

  

 Location: Remote (India)
   

  

 JobType: full\\-time
   

  

 This role is designed for a highly experienced engineer with deep expertise in Chromium internals and strong command over C\\+\\+. You will work hands\\-on with browser architecture, performance optimization, memory management, and distributed system components. The position requires at least 4\\+ years of specialized Chromium experience along with a solid decade of industry exposure. You'll contribute to building high\\-performance, scalable, and stable browser\\-based systems while collaborating with engineering teams in a remote or hybrid environment within India.
   

  

**Requirements**
****Key Responsibilities****
* Work extensively with Chromium internals to develop, enhance, and optimize browser features
* Design, implement, and maintain high\\-performance C\\+\\+ components across complex system architectures
* Perform advanced debugging, profiling, and performance tuning for browser and system\\-level modules
* Handle memory management challenges and optimize resource utilization
* Work with distributed systems components ensuring scalability and reliability
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional engineering teams, architects, and product stakeholders
* Ensure high code quality, maintainability, and adherence to best engineering practices
* Troubleshoot system\\-level issues and provide long\\-term, scalable solutions


**What Makes You a Great Fit**
* 4\\+ years of strong hands\\-on experience specifically with Chromium internals
* At least 10 years of overall software engineering experience
* Deep expertise in C\\+\\+ design principles, debugging, and performance optimization
* Strong understanding of distributed systems architecture and memory management
* Ability to solve highly complex technical challenges with precision and efficiency
* Strong analytical mindset, attention to detail, and a passion for systems\\-level engineering
* Comfortable working independently while collaborating effectively with global teams
* Ability to thrive in remote or hybrid work environments within India

title: Senior Python Backend Developer
description:
**Role Title: Senior Python Backend Developer** 




**Experience:** 
**5\\+** 




**Work Location: Hyderabad / Gurgaon / Coimbatore \\- Hybrid** 




**Notice Period:** 
**Immediate joiners / 30 days / 45 days** 




  





**About the Role:** 




 We are looking for a highly skilled and motivated
 **Senior Python Developer** 
 to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a background in web development using Python and related frameworks.
 



  





**Responsibilities:** 




 ‚Ä¢ Designing, implementing, and maintaining web applications that meet the needs of our clients.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Focus on engineering best practices and continuous improvement, and have lots of business exposure, enabling you to see the results of your work.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Excellent knowledge of the DevOps process and can work with large and complex codebases to ensure our product is leading edge
 



 ‚Ä¢ Collaborating with clients, stakeholders, and team members to gather requirements and understand project objectives.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Ensuring websites are optimized for performance, security, and search engine optimization (SEO) best practices.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Collaborating with cross\\-functional teams, including designers, front\\-end developers, and project managers, to deliver high\\-quality projects on time and within budget.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Identify and implement performance optimizations including caching strategies, query optimization, and front\\-end optimizations.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Able to customize configuration and settings to meet specific project requirements like permissions, user\\-roles, workflows, and other site\\-specific settings.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Use version control systems like Git to manage code repositories and collaborate with other developers.
 



  





**Experience:** 




 ‚Ä¢ Python development experience with a focus on web applications/services
 



 ‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge of Python 3\\.x and either FastAPI/Flask framework
 



 ‚Ä¢ Hands\\-on experience with RDBMS (Postgres, Oracle or others) and ORM Write clean, maintainable, and well\\-documented code following best practices and industry standards
 



 ‚Ä¢ Experience developing API microservices Significant experience of working with Agile methodology
 



 ‚Ä¢ Good problem\\-solving skills
 



  





**Good to have:** 




 ‚Ä¢ GCP or any other Cloud experience Kubernetes experience
 



  





**About Verticurl:** 




 Verticurl (a division of Ogilvy), is a WPP company, was established in 2006 with the mission to be the world‚Äôs leading marketing technology services agency for global organization with a presence in APAC, North America and LATAM. Verticurl global marketing automation, demand generation and digital strategy specialists support our customers in more than 14 different languages and in a variety of industry sectors, including High Tech, Banking, Insurance and Financial Services, Manufacturing, Healthcare and Consumer Electronics. WPP is listed in London stock exchange which has approximately 130,000 employees across more than 130 countries.
 



  





**About WPP:** 




 WPP is home to market\\-leading agency brands and more than 100,000 people committed to doing extraordinary work for our clients. No other company matches the breadth of our creative talent, the scale of our global presence, or the depth of our technology, data and AI capabilities. We have enduring relationships with leading global brands and organisations, including more than 300 of the Fortune 500, helping them to innovate, transform and grow. Our offer to clients spans every discipline of modern marketing through our global integrated media and creative agencies, public relations firms and specialist communications companies. We're committed to fostering a culture of creativity, belonging and continuous learning. By attracting the brightest talent and empowering our teams to do their best work, we deliver outstanding results for our clients. We bring teams together from around the world to deliver impactful ideas and leading capabilities for clients. Our state\\-of\\-the art campuses in the world‚Äôs top cities enable flexible working and seamless collaboration across marketing disciplines and agencies.

title: Principal SDET Engineer
description:
**Your work days are brighter here.**
 We‚Äôre obsessed with making hard work pay off, for our people, our customers, and the world around us. As a Fortune 500 company and a leading AI platform for managing people, money, and agents, we‚Äôre shaping the future of work so teams can reach their potential and focus on what matters most. The minute you join, you‚Äôll feel it. Not just in the products we build, but in how we show up for each other. Our culture is rooted in integrity, empathy, and shared enthusiasm. We‚Äôre in this together, tackling big challenges with bold ideas and genuine care. We look for curious minds and courageous collaborators who bring sun\\-drenched optimism and drive. Whether you're building smarter solutions, supporting customers, or creating a space where everyone belongs, you‚Äôll do meaningful work with Workmates who‚Äôve got your back. In return, we‚Äôll give you the trust to take risks, the tools to grow, the skills to develop and the support of a company invested in you for the long haul. So, if you want to inspire a brighter work day for everyone, including yourself, you‚Äôve found a match in Workday, and we hope to be a match for you too.
   

  

**About The Team**
 We are a dynamic team, that builds and manages the CI/CD pipelines for authentication and security features, ensuring that code changes are efficiently tested, and deployed. Our primary focus is on maintaining stability, enhancing automation, and fostering continuous improvement to empower security teams to deliver features more rapidly and with greater assurance.
   

  

**About The Role**
 Join our team as a Sr. SDET Engineer (P5\\) and play a pivotal role in ensuring the reliability and quality of our platform. You will work closely with development engineers, product and engineering managers to deliver reliable functionality for our platform. You will help streamline UI development core services and build a cohesive set of developer tools and automation. You will contribute to test automation, performance improvements, test stabilization and improve our continuous integration pipeline. Mentor and learn from other team members through pair programming, code reviews, brown bag sessions, etc.
   

  

**About You**
 Basic Qualifications:
   

  

* 10\\+ years of professional software engineering experience, with a strong background in Java and hands\\-on expertise in test automation, framework development, and system integration.
* 5\\+ years of experience in designing, implementing, and maintaining end\\-to\\-end CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Bitbucket, or TeamCity), ensuring pipeline stability, observability, and scalability.
* Strong command of the latest automation tools and frameworks such as Selenium, Playwright, TestNG, JUnit, Cucumber, and Appium, with an emphasis on reusability, reliability, and CI integration.
* Proven ability to architect, code, and maintain large\\-scale automation frameworks ‚Äî from concept to implementation ‚Äî supporting functional, integration, regression, and performance testing.
* Expert understanding of testing methodologies and experience in architecting and leading unit, system, integration, performance, security tests and observability tools
* Familiarity with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) and experience integrating tests in containerized build pipelines.
* Ability to create clear, concise, and comprehensive test plans, test cases, and automation framework documentation.
* Experience with performance and load testing frameworks (e.g., JMeter, Gatling) and ability to drive significant insights to improve system scalability.
* Knowledge/ experience with developing security, identity, authentication, authorization solutions and open standards such as SAML, OIDC is a plus.
* Strong debugging and problem\\-solving skills, with the ability to analyze and fix application issues.
* Strong collaboration record with cross\\-functional teams (Dev, Product, DevOps and Architecture) to drive quality ownership and accelerate delivery.
* Exposure to observability stacks (Grafana, Splunk, or ELK) for root\\-cause analysis and pipeline optimization.


 Other Qualification:
   

  

* Familiarity with security testing principles and tools (e.g., OWASP, ZAP) to identify vulnerabilities
* Passion for continuous learning, innovation, self\\-starter and applying new technologies to improve testing efficiency and developer productivity.
* Committed to fostering an inclusive, team\\-oriented environment and contributing to a culture of continuous improvement
* Proven track record in mentoring junior engineers and driving technical excellence across teams.
* Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development environment.
* Good communication, time management, organizational skills and attention to detail.


**Our Approach to Flexible Work**
 With Flex Work, we‚Äôre combining the best of both worlds: in\\-person time and remote. Our approach enables our teams to deepen connections, maintain a strong community, and do their best work. We know that flexibility can take shape in many ways, so rather than a number of required days in\\-office each week, we simply
 **spend at least half (50%) of our time each quarter in the office or in the field** 
 with our customers, prospects, and partners (depending on role). This means you'll have the freedom to create a flexible schedule that caters to your business, team, and personal needs, while being intentional to make the most of time spent together. Those in our remote "home office" roles also have the opportunity to come together in our offices for important moments that matter.
   

  

**Are you being referred to one of our roles? If so, ask your connection at Workday about our Employee Referral process!**
 At Workday, we value our candidates‚Äô privacy and data security. Workday will never ask candidates to apply to jobs through websites that are not Workday Careers.
   

  

 Please be aware of sites that may ask for you to input your data in connection with a job posting that appears to be from Workday but is not.
   

  

 In addition, Workday will never ask candidates to pay a recruiting fee, or pay for consulting or coaching services, in order to apply for a job at Workday.

title: Full Stack Android App Developer
description:
**Sustainability Consultant\\- Mumbai\\- NO REMOTE NO WFH NO HYBRID, IN PERSON OFFICE JOB, ONLY LOCAL MUMBAI CANDIDATES WILL BE CONSIDERED. FRESHERS DO NOT APPLY** 




 "Green Sarthi founder is looking for a talented Full Stack Android App Developer role.
 **Local Mumbai candidates will be preferred. This is an office\\-based position** 
 in the company. This role requires a proactive and detail\\-oriented individual who can do perform programming, research, manage multiple tasks efficiently and effectively. The consultant will play a key role in creating our company proprietary product app called "Green Safar". The candidate needs to be a extrovert, People person and communicate with all types of people. You should also know how to work with social media and computers. There is a lot of room to grow in the future for the ideal candidate where the company will support the ideal candidate to learn many new skills and guide their career as they desire. If you love environment and want to do something better for environment, please apply.
 



  





**About Us:** 




 Green Sarthi was formed with vision of providing sustainability in events. We make events sustainable with detailed carbon analysis. We provide planning, execution of events. We work to make environment better. We are developing an innovative android app called "Green Safar" integrated with Google Maps to track user's location live and then detect mode of transport using Machine Learning model and calculate carbon emissions at end of the trip.
 



**THERE WILL BE NO WFH OR HYBRID MODE FOR THE POSITION. JOB WILL BE IN PERSON IN OFFICE ONLY** 
 .
 **FRESHERS WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED.** 




  





**Key Responsibilities:** 




 1\\) Works as Full Stack Developer to develop frontend , backend and integration of frontend and backend along with AWS cloud handling and database on AWS.
 



 2\\) NO ON THE JOB TRAINING WILL BE PROVIDED. Provide IT related technical help to people in the firm.
 



 3\\) Provides seamless upload on Google play store and repeatedly keep checking app health and server health when app is live.
 



 4\\) Support live remotely during peak hour of event when event is live.
 



 5\\) Be a part of the company's R\\&D and sustainability initiatives.
 



 6\\) Create Machine Learning model required.
 



  





**Key Credentials:** 




 1\\) A bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering or any stream but related to software development is a must with at least
 **2 years of work experience** 
 mandatory as a Full Stack Developer related role.
 



 2\\) Have developed at least 5 Android Apps before.
 



 3\\)
 **Mandatory Tech Stack Skills Required: Flutter, AWS EC2, Python, Machine Learning, Python Libraries, AWS S3, React, HTML, CSS, JAVASCRIPT, Machine Learning.** 




 4\\) Experience with Dart and website development also a plus.
 



 5\\) Basic knowledge of sustainability would be required to understand end goals of app.
 



 6\\) 2 years minimum work experience required with independent full stack development of app and hosting on AWS.
 



 7\\) Strong organizational and multitasking skills.
 



 8\\) Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.
 



 9\\) Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and Teams.
 



 10\\)Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks effectively, and pay attention to detail.
 



 11\\)Active on LinkedIn and able to attend conferences and webinars.
 



 12\\)Ability to face and solve challenges.
 



 13\\)The candidate should be a self\\-starter and should be able to work with no supervision.
 



 14\\)Local Mumbai candidates ONLY CAN APPLY.
 



  





**Benefits:** 




 1\\) 40 hour Monday\\- Friday work week with half day on Saturday.
 



 2\\) Good work\\-life balance \\- 2 Paid Time off every month plus 2 Sick Leaves per month and all standard Indian festival holidays are off along with Diwali week as a holiday from the company.
 



 3\\) Open work culture with lots of fun, creativity, and a lot of room to grow in the career. Please email in your resumes to gaurav@greensarthi.com depicting past experiences. Salary will be based on experience and current market trends. No calls please. No whatsapp please"

title: Senior Salesforce CPQ Developer
description:
**Role Overview** 




 We are seeking highly skilled Salesforce CPQ Developers with strong hands\\-on experience in designing, developing, and implementing CPQ solutions. The ideal candidate has a deep understanding of the Salesforce platform, CPQ rules, Quote\\-to\\-Bill flows, and possesses advanced technical development capabilities.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Design, configure, and deliver end\\-to\\-end Salesforce CPQ solutions based on business needs.
* Develop Apex classes, triggers, LWC, and Aura components for custom CPQ functionalities.
* Configure CPQ components including:
* Product Configuration
* Logik.io integrations
* Price Rules
* Product Rules
* Approval Rules
* Build REST API\\-based integrations for Quote\\-to\\-Bill processes.
* Analyze CPQ requirements, propose scalable solutions, and ensure adherence to Salesforce best practices.
* Collaborate with business analysts, architects, and QA teams to ensure high\\-quality delivery.
* Troubleshoot CPQ issues and optimize performance.
* Prepare technical documentation and support deployment cycles.



  





**Required Technical Skills** 



* Strong expertise in
 **Salesforce platform architecture** 
 , security model, integrations, and data model.
* Mandatory hands\\-on experience in
 **Salesforce CPQ** 
 setup, configuration, and customization.
* Proficiency in
 **Apex (synchronous \\& asynchronous)** 
 ,
 **Triggers** 
 ,
 **Lightning Web Components (LWC)** 
 , and
 **Aura Framework** 
 .
* Experience with
 **Logik.io** 
 , pricing logic, and product configuration.
* Experience building
 **REST APIs** 
 and integrating CPQ with other systems.



  





**Certification Requirements** 



* **Salesforce Platform Developer II (PD2\\) ‚Äì Mandatory**
* **Salesforce JavaScript Developer Certification ‚Äì Mandatory**



  





**Soft Skills** 



* Strong communication and problem\\-solving skills.
* Ability to work independently and collaboratively.
* Effective stakeholder management and requirements understanding.
